duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and automate processes for end users needing masked data in a mainframe developer role.
Work with architects to create feature roadmaps and develop services for data masking.
Implement feature requests from clients and perform operations to ensure correct data obfuscation.
Work in a scrum team using agile methodologies and tools like Jira.
Explain technical solutions to technical and non-technical teams.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
